Name: Celestine Reef
Text: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.\nWhenever you roll {CHAOS}, until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

Name: Mirrored Depths
Text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If the player loses the flip, counter that spell.\nWhenever you roll {CHAOS}, target player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

Name: Stairs to Infinity
Text: Players have no maximum hand size.\nWhenever you roll the planar die, draw a card.\nWhenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top card of your planar deck. You may put it on the bottom of your planar deck.

Name: Tazeem
Text: Creatures can't block.\nWhenever you roll {CHAOS}, draw a card for each land you control.

Name: Tember City
Text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Tember City deals 1 damage to that player.\nWhenever you roll {CHAOS}, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

Name: Horizon Boughs
Text: All permanents untap during each player's untap step.\nWhenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
